response.overview: In the 1990s, young Tomek (28) becomes obsessed with Stella (60), a glamorous singer, building a fantasy world where he feels connected to her. The film twists expectations, showing desire in unexpected ways, while diving into obsession, blurred reality, and the illusions we create. As fame warps true connection, the line between real life and fantasy fades—making you wonder what’s truly real.
response.tagline: How far would you go for a love that only exists in your mind?
response.title: The Law of Series
